text: “Ndithu Allah sachita manyazi kupereka fanizo la udzudzu ndi choposerapo (pa udzudzuwo). Koma amene akhulupirira akuzindikira kuti (fanizolo) ndiloona ndi lochokera kwa Mbuye wawo. Koma amene sadakhulupirire, akunena: “Kodi Allah akufunanji pa fanizo lotereli?” (Allah) amawalekelera ambiri kusokera ndi fanizo lotere, komanso amawaongola ambiri ndi fanizonso lotere. Komatu sawalekelera kusokera nalo kupatula okhawo opandukira chilamulo (Chake)
